author: cnbc.com
title: QuickLogic reports 4Q loss
text:
SUNNYVALE, Calif. (AP) _ QuickLogic Corp. (QUIK) on Wednesday reported a loss of $3.4 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Sunnyvale, California-based company said it had a loss of 4 cents.
The maker of chips for mobile and portable electronics manufacturers posted revenue of $3 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $14.1 million, or 18 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $12.1 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, the company's shares hit $2.10. A year ago, they were trading at $1.63.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on QUIK at https://www.zacks.com/ap/QUIK
